title: A New England Nun - "he was as afraid of..." means

content.prompt: At the end of paragraph 2, the line "he was as afraid of betraying himself as she" is best interpreted to mean that

choices.label: Joe feared that Louisa was determined to reject him
both Joe and Louisa had been betrayed by Lily
Joe feared that Lily had betrayed him to Louisa
both Louisa and Joe hesitated to express their true desires

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
